gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all workflows in the Jira Cloud platform to understand the current processes in place.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all workflows with their details, including names, IDs, and statuses.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to create a new workflow for our project to streamline our issue tracking process.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a workflow definition and return the created workflow's ID and details.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to search for specific workflows to find the one that fits our needs.
gold.ideal: The API should return a paginated list of workflows based on search criteria, including total count and next page link.

gold.user: As an administrator, I want to delete an inactive workflow to keep our workflow list clean and manageable.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the specified workflow and return a success message.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to check which issue types are using a specific workflow in our project.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of issue types associated with the specified workflow and project.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to see all projects that are using a specific workflow to assess its impact.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of projects utilizing the specified workflow.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to find out which workflow schemes are associated with a specific workflow.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of workflow schemes linked to the specified workflow.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to read multiple workflows at once to analyze their configurations.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a list of workflow IDs and return their corresponding details.

gold.user: As a product manager, I want to know the capabilities of the workflow API to better plan our integration.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of capabilities supported by the workflow API.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to create multiple workflows at once to save time during setup.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a batch of workflow definitions and return the details of the created workflows.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to validate my workflow definitions before creating them to avoid errors.
gold.ideal: The API should check the provided workflow definitions and return any validation errors.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to know the default editor for workflows to ensure consistency in our configurations.
gold.ideal: The API should return the default editor settings for workflows.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to preview a workflow before finalizing it to ensure it meets our requirements.
gold.ideal: The API should return a preview of the specified workflow based on the provided definition.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to search for workflows by name to quickly find the one I need.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of workflows that match the search criteria.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to update existing workflows to reflect changes in our processes.
